text: Vernon D. Acree (June 25, 1919 – February 1, 2013) was an American administrator who served as Commissioner of the United States Customs Service from 1972 to 1977. He died of pneumonia on February 1, 2013, in Fairfax, Virginia at age 93. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Commissioners of the United States Customs Service
title: Vernon D. Acree
